title: Johnson and Johnson Logo?
content:
Anyone know what font (or a similar one) used in the Johnson and Johnson logo?   
   
Thanks in advance. ![johnson and johnson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215140103im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/12859.gif)
author: braveduck

comments.content:
I think this is quite likely custom drawn. Here's a   
 [thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215140103/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/12188.html?1056986064) with similar scripts.
